item.title: ‘South Park’ Creators Reveal Network Battle Over Premiere’s Trump Penis as They Joke: “We’re Terribly Sorry”
item.description: Their Comic-Con panel took place the day after the controversial ‘South Park’ season 27 premiere earned the ire of President Donald Trump and showed a version of him lying naked in bed with Satan.
